verses.text: See now! what is so good, or what so pleasant, as for brethren to dwell together?
\add It is\add* as ointment on the head, that ran down to the beard, \add even\add* the beard of Aaron; that ran down to the fringe of his clothing.
As the dew of Aermon, that comes down on the mountains of Sion: for there, the Lord commanded the blessing, even life for ever.
